name: listenership
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the people, type of people, or number of people who listen to a radio programme, recording, or type of music: No controller wants to run a station whose listenership is going down. There are radio stations that have an overwhelmingly white listenership.
More examplesFewer examplesThe true measure for any person in media is listenership and ratings.She believes that classical music may have new internet-based opportunities even as its listenership becomes more fragmented.Ratings estimates show that news programmes attracted record levels of listenership last spring.
